entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
